examples: Example alt text: 'Beautiful sunset over the mountains'.

challenges.title: Q2: Favourite Movies List
challenges.description: Create an unordered list of at least 3 of your favourite movies. Below it, create an ordered list of the top 3 things you want to learn in web development.
challenges.outputDescription: One unordered and one ordered list displayed.
examples: Use <ul> with <li> for movies and <ol> with <li> for learning goals.
